channel.title: [Kickstarter] Hit the Streets: Defend the Block
channel.description:
I've just launched a Kickstarter for Hit the Streets: Defend the Block, my street-level supers RPG using the core mechanics of the awesome 1%er - the Outlaw Biker Game from @Robert_Nolan. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/orklord/hit-the-streets-defend-the-block-tabletop-rpg
![](upload://qCpSprIKyR3To7mG3Omq54iE0T6.jpeg) The KS campaign is to fund professional layout from fellow Gauntleteer @jesseross and to buy more art to make this an amazing-looking game. It's already an amazingly fun game, thanks to the heavy playtesting feedback and participation from the Gauntlet Community.
Please check it out if it sounds like its your thing.

item.title: [Kickstarter] Hit the Streets: Defend the Block

item.description:
@Robert_Nolan wrote:

Good luck Rich! Hope it does great!

item.title: [Kickstarter] Hit the Streets: Defend the Block
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

I’ve just launched a Kickstarter for Hit the Streets: Defend the Block, my street-level supers RPG using the core mechanics of the awesome 1%er - the Outlaw Biker Game from @Robert_Nolan.

Kickstarter

Hit the Streets: Defend the Block tabletop RPG

A project to fund professional print layout and more art for a tabletop role-playing game called Hit the Streets: Defend the Block.

783×1000 85.6 KB

The KS campaign is to fund professional layout from fellow Gauntleteer @jesseross and to buy more art to make this an amazing-looking game. It’s already an amazingly fun game, thanks to the heavy playtesting feedback and participation from the Gauntlet Community.

Please check it out if it sounds like its your thing.

Read full topic
item.source: [Kickstarter] Hit the Streets: Defend the Block
